meanings.definition: A type of surfboard with a wooden exterior.
meanings.sent1: The beach was full of surfers carrying their woodies to catch the waves.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of friends enjoying the sun on their woodies by the shore.
meanings.sent3: The woodies on the beach seemed to be chatting with each other about the upcoming surf competition.
meanings.sent4: His woodie cut through the waves like a sleek dolphin, gliding effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The woodies lined up along the shore, waiting eagerly for their riders.

meanings.definition: A slang term for an erection.
meanings.sent1: He blushed when his friends teased him about getting a woodie in class.
meanings.sent2: The comedian made a joke about getting a woodie at the most awkward moments.
meanings.sent3: The old man chuckled, remembering the days when a woodie was a common occurrence.
meanings.sent4: His embarrassment was visible as he tried to hide his unexpected woodie.
meanings.sent5: The teenager's face turned red as he realized he had a woodie in the middle of the presentation.

meanings.definition: A type of bird found in wooded areas.
meanings.sent1: The woodies chirped melodiously in the forest, creating a symphony of nature.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pair of woodies building a nest high up in the trees.
meanings.sent3: The woodies seemed to be having a gossip session on the branches, sharing the latest forest news.
meanings.sent4: The woodies fluttered gracefully through the dense foliage, their colorful feathers shining in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The woodies' morning song woke up the entire woodland, signaling the start of a new day.
